name: 郭政淳
objective: 本課程有二大重心：一為介紹近代句法學理論並以英文為實例演示語言分析，以獲得對語法形式更深層的瞭解。二為透過功能(或形式)句法分析來檢視英語學習上遭遇的困難，藉以研發適當的教學方法或教材。
schedule:
Week 1 (9/12) Introduction
Week 2 (9/19) Word Classes (I): Definitions and Diagnostics 
Week 3 (9/26)　　Word Classes (II): Transcategorial Operations
Week 4 (10/3)　　Phrases: Headness
Week 5 (10/10) Holiday-No Class
Week 6 (10/17) Phrase Boundaries: Structural Ambiguity & Garden Path Effect
Week 7 (10/24) Basic Sentence Structure: Subject & Predicate
Week 8 (10/31) Grammatical Relations: Subject & Valency-Changing Operations
Week 9 (11/7)　　Constituency Tests (& Tree Diagram)
Week 10 (11/14) Term Project Preview
Week 11 (11/21) Scope & Negation 
Week 12 (11/28) Question Formation 
Week 13 (12/5) Relative Clauses 
Week 14 (12/12) Complex Sentences
Week 15 (12/19) Inner vs. outer Aspect
Week 16 (12/26) Word Order and Extraposition
Week 17 (1/2)　　Term Project Presentation
Week 18 (1/9)　　No Class (Term Project Due)
scorePolicy:
Exercises: 20%
Group Report: 20%
Presentation: 20%
Term Project: 40%
materials:
DeCapua, Andrea. 2017. Grammar for teachers: A guide to American English for native and non-native speakers. Springer (E-copy available in NTUT library)

Lock, Graham. 1996. Functional English grammar: An introduction for second language teachers. New York: Cambridge University Press. (available in NTUT library)

Hargis, H. Charles. 2008. English syntax: An outline for teachers of English language learners. Charles C Thomas.
